snippet: A tussle over the nomination of Pranab Mukherjee, a veteran politician, for president, appears to be a rare case in which the governing Congress Party has outfoxed the competition.
abstract: Tussle over the nomination of Pranab Mukherjee, a veteran politician, for India's president tests the power and mettle of the Congress Party, which generally dominates Indian politics.
lead_paragraph: A tussle over the nomination of Pranab Mukherjee, a veteran politician, for president, appears to be a rare case in which the governing Congress Party has outfoxed the competition.

headline.seo: Fight Over President Post Tests Mettle of Indian Congress Party
headline.main: Fight Over Post Tests India Party’s Mettle
headline.print_headline: Fight Over Post Tests India Party’s Mettle
